sodium.options.set_pov_warm.name: No longer show PojavLauncher warning
sodium.options.set_pov_warm.tooltip: If you known what are you doing now, you can turn off the warning by clicking here.
If you have installed the “Sodium Extra”: If you have installed the “Sodium Extra” or “Reese's Sodium Options” modules, you can enable this option. If you have not installed the above modules, the information will not be fully displayed after enabling this option. This option will take effect when this interface is reopened
